A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Jesus Christ... what a mess.
I don't even like the Star Wars saga\, or the films\, but I am a sci-fi lover so I had to go see it. Already thought that the last film was a let down\, BUT THIS?!

Boy oh boy...the plot is such a mess\, plot holes all over\, weird and plain stupid things are happening on the silver screen. See\, this is a fantasy/sci-fi film\, to talk about logic is almost a little comical anyway\, BUT the characters motivations\, decisions etc. just don't make sense.

Save yourself the cash seeing this in theater\, wait for it to show up for free on Netlfix sometime. MAN\, I don't even like the 70's\, 80's or whatever orginals\, but they are by FAAAAR better than this. Stick to those 3 and completely forget about what Disney came up with since 2015.
